summary: BRIDGESTONE 8R19.5 TIRE.  HAVE HAD TWO  BLOWOUTS ON VERY GOOD TIRES ON MY MOTORHOME.  FIRST BLOWOUT WAS APRIL 06 AND THE MOST RECENT WAS JULY 06.  EACH TIME THE VEHICLE WAS OPERATING AT NORMAL SPEED WITH PROPER TIRE INFLATION.  UNKNOWN AS TO WHY THESE TIRES HAVE FAILED.  HAVE REPLACED FIRST BLOWOUT WITH A USED NON BRIDGESTONE TIRE AND REPLACED 2ND BLOWOUT WITH A NEW NON BRIDGESTONE TIRE AS A SPARE.  CONCERN IS ON THE REMAINING TIRES ON MY VEHICLE.  THIS IS AN EXPENSIVE FIX TO REPLACE THE OTHER FOUR TIRES THAT APPEAR TO BE PERFECTLY IN VERY GOOD CONDITION.  HELP, PLEASE!!!  MOTORHOME SUSTAINED SOME DAMAGE TO UNDER CARRIAGE TO TO BOTH BLOWOUTS WITH THE LAST BLOWOUT WAS MORE SEVERE.  MOTORHOME IS PARK PENDING FINDINGS OF THESE TIRES.  *NM
